side.value: Increase performance and reduce back-pressure with a high-flow CMW Downpipe. Experience faster spool, increased power, and a more aggressive exhaust note. Featuring a cast French head to 5" downpipe and handcrafted 304 stainless steel construction.

Significantly reduce back-pressure by eliminating the restrictive catalytic converter in the factory downpipe. Our catless design results in faster spool, increased power, and a more aggressive exhaust note. The downpipe features a full 5" stainless steel construction and a CNC-machined 304 grade stainless steel flange, ensuring a smooth transition from the turbo to the mid-pipes.
